rules.description: Launcher (F24 + Q/W/E/R on Corne): iTerm, Chrome, Slack, Linear
Make the dagger (†) key combo type tilde (~) on Finnish layout
Corne layers: hold F24 = LEFT layer, hold F23 = RIGHT layer
LEFT layer: Q→1 … P→0 and HJKL arrows
RIGHT layer (Finnish macOS): letters → symbols using Option/Shift combos
LEFT layer (Corne only): Shift+I → '>' and Shift+O → '<'
